Html:
I am trying to implement an image overlay but the projection is WGS84. Should I reproject the image before sticking on the map or is there a way to visualize the map in a WGS84 projection ?

Thanks
depends on the map provider you use

Suppose I use OpenStreetMap. I saw that some of the maps have different projection, for example ArcGIS_StreetMap_World_2D_Map has a PlateCarre projection but there could be other types. Is there any feature in the library that allows me to reproject an image according to the selected projection type or this has to be done outside the GMAP and then the result shown in GMAP ?

thanks
